description: This event will be triggered whenever a SAN
aggregation group changes its speed.

event.Summary: SAN aggregation group $v1 speed changed from $v2 to $v3

description: The serial number of the current SAN aggregation group.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SAN-AGG-MIB::hpnicfSanAggGroupNumber

description: The previous speed of the SAN aggregation group.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SAN-AGG-MIB::hpnicfSanAggGroupPreviousSpeed

description: The current speed of the SAN aggregation group.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SAN-AGG-MIB::hpnicfSanAggGroupCurrentSpeed

description: This event will be triggered whenever any member
in a SAN aggregation group is made inactive.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-SAN-AGG-MIB::hpnicfSanAggMemberInactive HPN-ICF-SAN-AGG-MIB::hpnicfSanAggGroupNumber i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE

description: The serial number of the current SAN aggregation group.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SAN-AGG-MIB::hpnicfSanAggGroupNumber

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: This event will be triggered whenever any member
in a SAN aggregation group is made active.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-SAN-AGG-MIB::hpnicfSanAggMemberActive HPN-ICF-SAN-AGG-MIB::hpnicfSanAggGroupNumber i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE

description: The serial number of the current SAN aggregation group.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-SAN-AGG-MIB::hpnicfSanAggGroupNumber

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr
